channel.title: What commercial/AAA game do you think has the most realistic gun sounds?
channel.description:
As the title says, what AAA games do you think have the most realistic sounds for guns?
As good as BFBC2 and BF3 guns sound, they seem to be more "cinematic", at least most of the guns I've heard fired or seen in videos don't sound like their in game variants, in fact many of them sound much more "raw" in RL if you get my meaning.
I think BF2 had the most realistic gun sounds. They aren't all spot on, but most of them seem pretty similar to their RL counterparts and have that "raw" sound to them.

item.title: What commercial/AAA game do you think has the most realistic gun sounds?
item.dc:creator: Bloodshot
item.description:
They did sound good but a lot of them weren’t accurate.

I really liked the M1 garand in CoD 1

Read full topic

item.title: What commercial/AAA game do you think has the most realistic gun sounds?
item.dc:creator: Imonfire
item.description:
Kairouseki:

That’s weird because everywhere I see that mentions CoD’s gun sounds say they sound like crap.

CoD 1 and 2 had some of the best gun sound ever. It went downhill after the fourth.

item.title: What commercial/AAA game do you think has the most realistic gun sounds?
item.dc:creator: xalener
item.description:
Katana:

Least favorite are Bad Company 2’s, but they may sound better if I had some sort of bass audio system

Ofc you’re gonna like shit sounds if you got a shit sound system.

Battlefield 2 + has always had the tastiest sounds for decent cones.

But Black… I totally forgot about that game. Fucking hell it was awesome.

item.title: What commercial/AAA game do you think has the most realistic gun sounds?
item.dc:creator: Katana
item.description:
Realistic? Bleeeeeh.

My favorites have been from Call of Duty (they at least get something right) and Killing Floor. (Especially their recoil animations)

Least favorite are Bad Company 2’s, but they may sound better if I had some sort of bass audio system

item.title: What commercial/AAA game do you think has the most realistic gun sounds?
item.dc:creator: Eric_Fong
item.description:
k3nny1550:

Oh, it is. Wait till you try the game’s M16.

Speaking of which, another reason I love this game so much is that the first person hands visibly take their finger out of the trigger guard when reloading. A lot of shooters don’t get that right.

I love Black, that’s why I made this animation https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6QikLZ_yCn8&feature=channel_video_title

Read full topic

you schouldn’t use videos as reference.

Plus, you are sticking the gun on your face.

item.title: What commercial/AAA game do you think has the most realistic gun sounds?
item.dc:creator: ac3d
item.description:
BF3 has the best sounding guns but I don’t think they’re realistic, when you hear real rifles being fired in videos they all sound the same, but all the guns in the game have gone through filters to give them more thick meaty and distinctive sounds to be more entertaining, especially the M16 and AK, they sound amazing.

Read full topic

item.title: What commercial/AAA game do you think has the most realistic gun sounds?
item.dc:creator: Nerdguy
item.description:
dblkion:

BF3 have great sounds, no only about the single fire & weapon reload but also all the incoming fire at you and the impacts on metal and such are truly great.

Actually I believe this is the best part of the game, the rest being pretty bad

Not even the graphics are good?
